# init(primaryPlayer:)

**Initializer**

Creates an observer with a player item.

## Declaration

```swift
init(primaryPlayer: AVPlayer)
```

## Parameters

- **primaryPlayer**: An object that plays the primary content.
title: init(primaryPlayer:)
